godsinfluence.godsoversee: The gods are real and people embody their teachings. They claim dominion over aspects of the world.
godsinfluence.godsinhabit: What if the gods in your world walk the same plane as the players? What if players can challenge them and sieze power.
godsinfluence.godsareabsent: What if gods don't exist or are lost, requiring players to gain strength and find out the reason of their absence.

stateoftheworld.untamed: The world is wind and large regions are unexplored and un-populated.
stateoftheworld.mundane: The magic is rare and dangerous, what if it's historically accurate?

ageoftheworld.new: What if your world is new, the world has only just formed and inhabitants are the first heroes!
ageoftheworld.ancient: The world has seen empires rise and fall. War, time, and all manner of forces have shaped it with their influence.

conflictandhistory.confict: War, Power, Factions, Kingdoms, Prophets - all fighting to shape the history of your world.

magicandyourworld.magiciscommon: Magic users and magic is prevalent and influences the life of the world. Magic items are available and even artifacts and powerful magic users are know to exist.
magicandyourworld.magicisrare: Magic is shunned or an unspeakable offense. It isn't practiced or taught.

evilandgood.balance: The world has ideals of evil and good, beings of both sides.
evilandgood.ideals: The ideals of good and evil are warped and mean different things to the peoples of the world.

pantheons.forgottenrealms: Traditional Forgotten Realms gods for this world.

divineranks.bestowed: Gods choose the ranks of their followers.

faerun.description: The westernmost portion of Toril's central supercontinent, a diverse landscape inhabited by numerous races and cultures, including humans, dwarves, elves, halflings, and gnomes

zakhara.description: A mostly hot, arid realm dominated by elemental forces and a philosophy of fate and honor

kara-Tur.description: The exotic east, steeped in ancient history like fine tea.

maztica.description: Primitive cultures bound by duty to their gods gave blood sacrifices in return for power while those who disagreed with the practice struggled to survive.

anchorome.description: Hardly explored, seemingly populated with violent elves and more of the humans found in Maztica.

laerakond.description: A continent formerly located in the world of Abeir, a land of dragon empires and new cultures.

osse.description: Populated by spiritualists and druids, the spirit world and nature dominated the lives of its inhabitatants. Unexplored.
